title: It's aboat time for the Barcolana
caption: It's aboat time for the Barcolana
desc: Today we're featuring an image of the Barcolana regatta, which is happening this weekend off the shore of Trieste, Italy. What makes this race so unusual, and so popular, is that it's open to both professional and amateur sailors. Since the first race in 1969, which attracted 51 boats, it's been drawing increasing numbers of sailors and spectators to Trieste each year.
